import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save issue options for site"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/issues/{issueId}/site"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates site-specific options for an issue, such as role visibility or other per-site settings. Use this when configuring which roles can see or select an issue at a specific site.

**Prerequisites**
1. **issueId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/issues](/docs/api/issues/list-issues) or [POST /api/v1.0/issues](/docs/api/issues/search-issues) and extract `Items[].IssueId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Review current role settings: [GET /api/v1.0/issues/\{issueId\}/roles](/docs/api/issues/get-issue-roles).
2. Build the `EntitySiteOption` array for the desired site settings.
3. Save options: [POST /api/v1.0/issues/\{issueId\}/site](/docs/api/issues/save-issue-options-for-site) (set `applyToAllProducts=true` if needed).

**Minimal Required Fields**: issueId (path) plus a body array of site options.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"issueId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"applyToAllProducts","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean","default":false}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"EntitySiteOptionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"RoleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"IsDefaultForEntityType":{"type":"boolean"},"Enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"ChildrenEnabledByDefault":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true}},"example":{"EntitySiteOptionId":"f1e2d3c4-b5a6-7890-f1e2-d3c4b5a67890","ProductId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-a1b2-c3d4e5f67890","SiteId":"e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-e5f6-a7b8c9d01234","Enabled":true},"title":"EntitySiteOption"},"title":"SaveIssueOptionsForSiteIssuesByIssueIdSiteRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
